item.name: 7. Create a Symantec Endpoint Protection 14 Manager client group

request.description: Creates a new client group on the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager with a client group name specified in the http body as a JSON object name key. The new client group is created under a parent group id specified in the URL path, in this example the mycompany_root_id specifies that the new client group will be under the top level My Company group.

item.name: 10. Move a Symantec Endpoint Protection 14 client to a new test group

request.description: This request specifies the target group id for a computer id to report into. The hardwareKey value in the HTTP body species the endpoint that needs to be moved and the id : "{{group_id}}" specifies the target group.

  <RemediationAction>REMEDIATE</RemediationAction>
  <Threat category="Suspects" type="to_investigate" severity="low" time="">
    <Description>hackedpad.exe Scan</Description>

  </Threat>
  <Activity>

      <Process></Process>
